text: This had been my favorite place but the past two orders I’ve gotten have me switching stores. I received an order with thick crust instead of thin. A week later, I was charged $18 for one large pizza on a Wednesday, but somehow was able to …More

name: Stephen Smith
text: If you want to discover an affordable pizza establishment, then this is a great choice. I really enjoy the Ultimate Sub and the pizza is good. The staff are helpful and pleasant. I recommend Hungry Howie's if you prefer not to cook for yourself. If this review is helpful,  then please give it a thumbs up. #letsguide

text: Chase was very helpful and friendly! Appreciate that! Great pizza also!

text: My ham and cheese sub had chopped ham like they took it off a salad to put in the sub. The employees were not wearing masks. Someone's kid was standing behind the counter playing with dolls. A person walked in and went straight to the kitchen area.

text: There stuffed crust pizza is amazing! There salads are remarkable. Everything I've ever ordered from this place has always been fresh. Except there bread. But honestly it still tasted alright.

text: Best pizza prices in the area for it however kind courteous staff keep your order in a computer for next Sam cation order sameCase you wanna order same then It's a taste great and they're always friendly I called Domino's and they want $20 …More

text: A former favorite, and I moved away for ten years. I ordered again today, and it was every bit as delicious as I remember. The sauce (main ingredient of pizza for me!) was plentiful and rich in flavor. I love the flavored crusts they offer. …More
